content.rendered:
Now Hiring!

We are now hiring for full-time and part-time sales associate positions at all Gottwals Books locations. Submit your resumes to office@gottwalsbooks.com for consideration.

Crazy Aaron’s Thinking Putty

This is better than the Silly Putty you may remember! Crazy Aaron’s Thinking Putty is less sticky so it doesn’t easily pick up dirt and dust. It is more colorfast with little to no mess. Kids of all ages are fascinated by the science aspects of the product, such as the magnetic and UV light-reactive putty. Adults may find themselves bringing putty to work as a fidget tool to increase focus and concentration.

Bulk School Book Orders

Many teachers and school districts have discovered the benefits of placing their orders (both large and small) with Gottwals Books. We have relationships with multiple distributors and warehouses, allowing us to offer the lowest prices of any other book vendor. We are even cheaper than buying online!

Sell Your School Books for Cash!

Bring your textbooks in for cash… It’s quick and easy and we pay more than you’ll ever get from your campus bookstore!
